short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All the latest UK technology news, reviews and analysis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: V3.co.uk provides technology professionals with 24/7 news and analysis on the happenings of the IT industry.  V3.co.uk serves an audience of IT buyers and business decision-makers with up-to-the-minute news, reviews and analysis written by a team of expert IT journalists in the UK and Silicon Valley. V3.co.uk delivers real-time IT news, features and analysis alongside product reviews, software downloads, video demos, blogs, white papers and IT jobs to a broad audience of IT professionals and enthusiasts.
